text:
London, UK (or Remote for the right candidate, with a UK work visa)
Likely Ltd are looking for developers to work on some interesting social media analytics problems. I'm leaving at the end of the month, but it's a great place to work - at the moment we need people with experience in any or all of: Ruby, Erlang, Java, Hadoop (Mapreduce and Hbase). If you have any machine learning or statistical computing skills that'd be a definite bonus. If you're iterested, please send your details to Henry, our CTO, at henry@likely.co Thanks!
